name: NHS England Low Priority Treatment - Silk Garments
title: Silk Garments cost per 1000 patients
openc_numerator_name: NHS England Low Priority Treatment - Silk Garments
why_it_matters: Silk Garments are knitted, medical grade silk clothing which are sometimes used
as an adjunct to normal treatment for severe eczema and allergic skin conditions.
concluded that using silk garments for the management of eczema is unlikely to be cost-effective for the NHS.
